Verses: 1 bendhekosthe Ennum Naal Vandhabodhu, Avargalellaarum Orumanappattu Oridaththile Vandhirundhaargal.
2 appozhudhu Balaththa Kaatru Adikkira Muzhakkam Pola, Vaanaththilirundhu Sadidhiyaai Oru Muzhakkamundaagi, Avargal Utkaarndhirundha Veetu Muzhuvadhaiyum Nirappitru.
3 allaamalum Akkinimayamaana Naavugalpolap Pirindhirukkum Naavugal Avargalukkuk Kaanappattu Avargal Ovvoruvarmelum Vandhu Amarndhadhu.
4 avargalellaarum Parisuththa Aaviyinaale Nirappappattu, Aaviyaanavar Thangalukkuth Thandharulina Varaththinpadiye Vevveru Baashaigalile Pesaththodanginaargal.
5 vaanaththin Keezhirukkira Sagala Dhesaththaarilumirundhuvandha Dhevabakthiyulla Yoodhargal Appozhudhu Erusalemile Vaasampanninaargal.
6 andhach Saththam Undaanabodhu, Thiralaana Janangal Koodivandhu, Thangal Thangal Baashaiyile Avargal Pesugiradhai Avaravargal Kettapadiyinaale Kalakkamadaindhaargal.
7 ellaarum Biramiththu Aachchariyappattu, Oruvaraiyoruvar Paarththu: Idho, Pesugira Ivargalellaarum Galileyarallavaa?
8 appadiyirukka Nammil Avaravargaludaiya Jenmabaashaigalile Ivargal Pesak Ketkirome, Idheppadi?
9 paarththarum, Medharum, Elaameeththarum, Mesoppoththaamiyaa, Yoodheyaa, Kappaththokkiyaa, Pondhu, Aasiyaa, Pirigiyaa,

10 bambiliyaa, Egipthu Ennum Dhesaththaargalum, Sirene Pattanaththaich Sutriyirukkira Libiyaavin Thisaigalile Kudiyirukkiravargalum, Inge Sanjarikkira Romaaburiyaarum, Yoodharum, Yoodhamaarkkaththamaindhavargalum,
11 gireththarum, Arabiyarumaagiya Naam Nammudaiya Baashaigalile Ivargal Dhevanudaiya Magaththuvangalaip Pesakketkirome Endraargal.
12 ellaarum Biramiththuch Sandhegappattu, Idhennamaai Mudiyumo Endru Oruvarodoruvar Sollikkondaargal.
13 matravargalo: Ivargal Madhubaanaththinaal Niraindhirukkiraargalendru Pariyaasampanninaargal.

14 appozhudhu Pedhuru Padhinoruvarotunkooda Nindru, Avargalai Nokki: Uraththa Saththamaai: Yoodhargale, Erusalemil Vaasampannugira Janangale, Neengalellaarum Arindhukolveergalaaga, En Vaarththaigalukkuch Sevikodungal.
15 neengal Ninaikkirapadi Ivargal Verikondavargalalla, Pozhudhu Vidindhu Moondraam Mani Velaiyaayirukkiradhe.
16 theerkkadharisiyaagiya Yovelinaal Uraikkappattapadiye Idhu Nadandherugiradhu.

17 kadaisinaatkalil Naan Maamsamaana Yaavarmelum En Aaviyai Ootruven, Appozhudhu Ungal Kumaararum Ungal Kumaaraththigalum Theerkkadharisanansolluvaargal; Ungal Vaalibar Dharisanangalai Adaivaargal; Ungal Mooppar Soppanangalaik Kaanbaargal;
18 ennudaiya Oozhiyakkaararmelum, Ennudaiya Oozhiyakkaarigalmelum Annaatkalil En Aaviyai Ootruven, Appozhudhu Avargal Theerkkadharisananj Solluvaargal.
19 allaamalum Uyara Vaanaththile Arpudhangalaiyum, Thaazha Boomiyile Raththam, Akkini, Pugaikkaadaagiya Adhisayangalaiyum Kaattuven.
20 karththarudaiya Peridhum Piragaasamumaana Naal Varumunne Sooriyan Irulaagavum, Sandhiran Raththamaagavum Maarum.
21 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Naamaththaith Thozhudhukollugiravanevano Avan Ratchikkappaduvaan Endru Dhevan Uraiththirukkiraar.

22 isravelare, Naan Sollum Vaarththaigalaik Kelungal; Neengal Arindhirukkirapadi Nasareyanaagiya Yesuvaith Dhevan Ungalukkulle Balaththa Seygaigalaiyum, Arpudhangalaiyum, Adaiyaalangalaiyum Nadappiththu, Avaigalinaale Avarai Ungalukku Velippaduththinaar.

23 appadiyirundhum, Dhevan Nirnayiththirundha Aalosanaiyinpadiyeyum, Avarudaiya Munnarivinpadiyeyum Oppukkodukkappatta Andha Yesuvai Neengal Pidiththu, Akkiramakkaararudaiya Kaigalinaale Siluvaiyil Aaniyadiththuk Kolaiseydheergal.
24 dhevan Avarudaiya Marana Ubaadhigalin Kattai Avizhththu, Avarai Ezhuppinaar; Avar Maranaththinaal Kattappattirukkakkoodaadhirundhadhu.
25 avaraikkuriththuth Thaaveedhu: Karththarai Eppozhudhum Enakkumunbaaga Niruththi Nokkikkondirukkiren; Naan Asaikkappadaadhapadi Avar En Valadhupaarisaththile Irukkiraar;
26 adhinaale En Irudhayam Magizhndhadhu, En Naavu Kalikoorndhadhu, En Maamsamum Nambikkaiyode Thangiyirukkum;
27 en Aaththumaavaip Paadhaalaththil Viteer, Ummudaiya Parisuththar Azhivaikkaanavotteer;
28 jeevamaarkkangalai Enakkuth Theriyappaduththineer; Ummudaiya Sannidhaanaththile Ennaich Sandhoshaththinaal Nirappuveer Endru Sollugiraan.

29 sagodharare, Koththirath Thalaivanaagiya Thaaveedhaikkuriththu Naan Ungaludane Dhairiyamaaip Pesugiradharku Idankodungal; Avan Maranamadaindhu Adakkampannappattaan; Avanudaiya Kallarai Innaalvaraikkum Nammidaththilirukkiradhu.
30 avar Theerkkadharisiyaayirundhu: Un Singaasanaththil Veetrirukka Maamsaththinpadi Un Sandhadhiyile Kiristhuvai Ezhumbappannuven Endru Dhevan Thanakkuch Saththiyampanninadhai Arindhapadiyinaal,
31 avan Kiristhuvinudaiya Aaththumaa Paadhaalaththile Vidappaduvadhillaiyendrum, Avarudaiya Maamsam Azhivaik Kaanbadhillaiyendrum Munnarindhu, Avar Uyirththezhudhalaikkuriththu Ippadich Sonnaan.
32 indha Yesuvai Dhevan Ezhuppinaar; Idharku Naangalellaarum Saatchigalaayirukkirom.

33 avar Dhevanudaiya Valadhukaraththinaale Uyarththappattu, Pidhaa Aruliya Vaakkuththaththaththinpadi Parisuththa Aaviyaip Petru, Neengal Ippozhudhu Kaangiradhum Ketkiradhumaagiya Idhaip Pozhindharulinaar.
34 thaaveedhu Paralogaththirku Ezhundhupogavillaiye. Naan Ummudaiya Saththurukkalai Umakkup Paadhapadiyaakkippodum Varaikkum,
35 neer En Valadhupaarisaththil Utkaarumendru Karththar En Aandavarudane Sonnaar Endru Avane Solliyirukkiraan.
36 aagaiyinaal, Neengal Siluvaiyil Araindha Indha Yesuvaiye Dhevan Aandavarum Kiristhuvumaakkinaarendru Isravel Kudumbaththaar Yaavarum Nichchayamaai Ariyakkadavargal Endraan.
37 idhai Avargal Kettapozhudhu, Irudhayaththile Kuththappattavargalaagi, Pedhuruvaiyum Matra Apposthalaraiyum Paarththu: Sagodharare, Naangal Enna Seyyavendum Endraargal.

38 pedhuru Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Mananthirumbi, Ovvoruvarum Paavamannippukkendru Yesukiristhuvin Naamaththinaale Gnaanasnaanam Petrukkollungal, Appozhudhu Parisuththa Aaviyin Varaththaip Peruveergal.
39 vaakkuththaththamaanadhu Ungalukkum, Ungal Pillaigalukkum, Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Varavazhaikkum Dhooraththilulla Yaavarukkum Undaayirukkiradhu Endru Solli;
40 innum Anega Vaarththaigalaalum Saatchikoori, Maarubaadulla Indhach Sandhadhiyai Vittu Vilagi Ungalai Ratchiththukkollungal Endrum Buththisonnaan.
41 avanudaiya Vaarththaiyaich Sandhoshamaai Etrukkondavargal Gnaanasnaanam Petraargal. Andraiyathdhinam Erakkuraiya Moovaayiramper Serththukkollappattaargal.
42 avargal Apposthalarudaiya Ubadhesaththilum, Anniyonniyaththilum, Appam Pitkudhalilum, Jebampannudhalilum Urudhiyaaith Thariththirundhaargal.
43 ellaarukkum Bayamundaayitru. Apposthalargalaale Anega Arpudhangalum Adaiyaalangalum Seyyappattadhu.
44 visuvaasigalellaarum Orumiththirundhu, Sagalaththaiyum Podhuvaai Vaiththu Anubaviththaargal.
45 kaaniyaatchigalaiyum Aasthigalaiyum Vitru, Ovvoruvanukkum Thevaiyaanadharkuththakkadhaaga Avaigalil Ellaarukkum Pagirndhu Koduththaargal.
46 avargal Orumanappattavargalaai Dhevaalayaththile Anudhinamum Thariththirundhu, Veedugaldhorum Appampittu Magizhchchiyodum Kabadamillaadha Irudhayaththodum Pojanampanni,
47 dhevanaith Thudhiththu, Janangalellaaridaththilum Dhayavupetrirundhaargal. Ratchikkappadugiravargalaik Karththar Anudhinamum Sabaiyile Serththukkonduvandhaar.
